resources.string: A top-notch anonymous messenger encrypted with a Blockchain
Or create a new anonymous address:
Save the passphrase for new Wallet and Messenger account. There is no login to enter Wallet, only the passphrase needed. If lost, no way to recover it.
Are you sure you want to delete this node from list?
You can add the recipient\'s address through an image from the gallery or by scanning the QR code:
QR-code has been saved in gallery
Are you sure you want to quit?
Application needs a write permission for save QR code in your gallery.
This currency is not supported yet
Word not found in word list: "%s", suggestions "%s", "%s"
Invalid symbol in passphrase. Available only [a-z] and space
Wrong count of words in passphrase. Need 12, current count: %d. Necessary: %d
This value must be a number.
FCM updated token. %s ADM has been withdrawn from your account

Notifications of new messages are sent by the ADAMANT Notification Service (Transport to your device is the Firebase Messaging Service). Notifications come almost instantly, but you need to register the device in the service. It is safe and maintains a high level of security. The cost of subscription, unsubscribe and token change (FCM can replace it at any time, but this rarely happens) is 0.001 ADM.

string.name: hello_message_ico
string.p: You have a possibility to Join the ICO of ADAMANT, the most secure and anonymous messenger. Learn more on Adamant.im website or in the Whitepaper.

Please make sure your have saved the passphrase to this account — exit your account and open it again. Better save your password on a sheet of paper also. But remember, only you are responsible for the passphrase safety. It cannot be recovered. And if other person will get it, your money will be stolen. Treat this question as secure, as if tokens in your wallet will cost a billion dollars some time.

To buy ADM tokens, go to Wallet tab and click Join the ICO, or open the page Adamant.im/ico/ in the web browser. In the ICO form enter your ADAMANT address — you will receive ADM tokens there. If you moved from Messenger App, your ADM address will be filled already, other way go back to Messenger and click ADAMANT address to copy it to clipboard. Next, choose crypto you want to spend and its amount. You\'ll see how much ADM tokens you will receive, including volume bonus: 20–30 ETH: +20%, 30–50 ETH: +30%, 50–90 ETH: +40%, 90+ ETH: +50%. Click Buy ADAMANT tokens. You\'ll get unique address where you need to send crypto. As soon as your transaction will be confirmed, you\'ll receive ADM tokens. Transaction can be done from any wallet or exchange. It is not necessary to transfer exact amount including transaction fees, the payment will be processed anyway.

After you receive ADM tokens, we recommend to keep them as long as possible. All of unsold tokens during ICO will be distributed among users\' wallets, adding 5% monthly. Additional info is on Adamant.im website and in the Whitepaper.
Do not reply to this message, it is a system account. If you still have any questions, contact account U15677078342684640219.

string.name: hello_message_baunty
string.p: Welcome to ADAMANT, the most secure and anonymous messenger. Remember, your security and anonymity is up to you also. Do not follow links you receive, otherwise your IP can be compromised. Do not trust browser extensions. Better to share your ADM address personally, but not using other messengers. Keep your secret passphrase secure. Set a password on your device or logout before leaving.
Learn more about security and anonymity at https://adamant.im/staysecured/.

All the transactions within the blockchain do need to have their minimal fees. This is necessary to support the network infrastructure. To start messengning now, get free tokens — go to Wallet tab and click Free ADM tokens. Then click Start new chat on Chats tab and put your interlocutor\'s address. To copy your address, click on ADAMANT address on Wallet tab.
Do not reply to this message, it is a system account. If you still have any questions, contact account U15677078342684640219.

resources.string: Welcome to ADAMANT, the genuine blockchain messenger.

ADAMANT is anonymity and security of your messaging as well as in-chat cryptocurrency transferring tool.

Why are other messengers not secure?

ADAMANT infrastructure doesn\'t belong to anyone and is decentralized.

It is maintained by messages paid in ADM tokens. New accounts may receive free tokens for testing purposes.

Create an account in a single click without any requirements (no email/phone/anything) and invite your friends.

Share your ADAMANT addresses in-person for true security.

The project\'s source code is completely open. The app is in development and we constantly add new features.

If you are a developer — join our team.
